section.para: To create a new Ship Via, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:

note.para: Ship Vias may be overwritten in various places throughout the application--for example, on the Sales Order header. This functionality is intentional. Ship Vias are intended to be editable.

section.para: When creating a new Ship Via, you are presented with the following options:
